title: Bloomberg's Heilemann on Trump, Fracture of Republicans (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Heilemann on Trump, Fracture of Republicans (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: John Heilemann , co-author of “Game Change” and host of Bloomberg TV’s “With All Due Respect,” highlights political news: Trump refuses to endorse Ryan/McCain; George Bush criticizes Trump; Clinton campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
